verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are the Lord
The famous One famous One
Great is Your name in all the earth
The heavens declare You're glorious glorious
Great is Your fame beyond the earth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
And for all You've done and yet to do
With ev'ry breath I'm praising You
Desire of nations and ev'ry heart
You alone are God
You alone are God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Morning Star is shining through
And ev'ry eye is watching You
Revealed by nature and miracles
You are beautiful
You alone are God
